```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidygraph)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
e <- read_excel('~/Teaching/communication_and_networks/activities/ego_networks/ego_edges.xlsx')
n <- read_excel('~/Teaching/communication_and_networks/activities/ego_networks/ego_atts.xlsx')
```

```{r}
G <- graph_from_data_frame(d=e, vertices = n, directed = F) %>% as_tbl_graph()
```

```{r}
G <- G %>%
  activate(edges) %>%
  filter(!is.na(weight)) %>%
  filter(weight != 0)
```
